DOC.brief_summary: The NICHD Global Network ( GN ) Women 's Children 's Health Research , multi-site , international research network , provide unique infrastructure implement expand perinatal verbal autopsy study use FIRST BREATH trial platform . The FIRST BREATH trial ongoing study neonatal resuscitation train rural community setting within Global Network sit Central Africa , Asia Latin America . This study use validate VA questionnaire determine COD stillbirths early neonatal death among participant FIRST BREATH study . We propose expand usefulness perinatal verbal autopsy methodology two way . First assess whether Community Coordinator ( non-physician health worker ) assign COD high level concordance comparable Physician Panel , second , whether FIRST BREATH Birth Attendant provide reliable perinatal information mother VA interview . Our primary hypothesis COD assign FIRST BREATH Community Coordinator COD assign Physician Panel great 70 % early neonatal death ( ENDs ) , use VA FIRST BREATH data .
DOC.brief_title: Verbal Autopsy Assess Early Neonatal Death Stillbirth
